Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2008 12:40PM Shade wrote: Just had a thought... Has anyone tried contacting Mix100FM, a radio station in Denver? I don't live in Denver so I haven't heard of it but I notice that they are sponsoring and promoting the Avon Walk for Breast Cancer - Rocky Mountain Walk on June 28-29, 2008. Seeing as the event is coming up soon, perhaps they would be willing to talk about Angela's story on air and see if anyone comes forward to help with treatment or perhaps getting an airline, Disneyland and a hotel to donate? Perhaps we could also contact the PR company that is raising awareness of the Avon walk to see if Avon might be able to help with making Angela's trip to Disneyland possible? The PR company might also be able to do some pro-bono (ie free) PR work to help us make Disneyland and the airlines aware of what we are trying to do. The contact details for the PR company for the Avon breast cancer walk is: Randi Friedman BNC 212.253.4650 RFriedman@bncpr.com Shade
